sense.def:
An example
je tisto, kar zastopa ali je značilno za določeno skupino stvari.

seg.quote: It's a very fine example of traditional architecture.
Could you give me an example?

sense.def:
Če je nekdo
an example to other people
ali
sets an example
, se vede na način, ki bi ga morali drugi posnemati.

seg.quote: They are a shining example to progressive people everywhere.
She set such a good example to us all.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
for example
povemo, da navajamo zgled določene vrste stvari.

seg.quote: Japan, for example, has two languages.

sense.def:
To follow someone's example
pomeni posnemati vedênje nekega človeka.
